about_the_game:
This is the official BGM material for the electro-sounding action game TSCOOL MV.
You can use originality music for your game.


Electro sound made by Cubase Pro12.
It is composed by one of modesty , Mode P.

Music with originality. It is music with a unique feeling.

Recommended for sci-fi action games.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


BGM (7 songs)

ogg files: 7 songs

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
